dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3402 IH: Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Poliquin (for himself, Mr. Schrader, Ms. Herrera Beutler, Mr. Kind, Mr. Garamendi, Mr. Walz, Mr. Rokita, Mr. Messer, and Mr. Valadao) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the fresh fruit and vegetable program under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to include canned, dried, frozen, or pureed fruits and vegetables.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act.

section.header: Amendments to fruit and vegetable program
section.text: Section 19 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1769a) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking Fresh;
in subsection (a), by inserting , canned, dried, frozen, or pureed after fresh;
in subsection (b), by inserting , canned, dried, frozen, or pureed after fresh; and
in subsection (e), by inserting , canned, dried, frozen, or pureed after fresh.
